items.title: Why Is Micron Stock Down In Premarket Today?
items.description: Shares continue to slide after declining nearly 5% on Friday.

items.title: Bitcoin Crashing Prompts Binance To Add 1,300 BTC To Its $1 Billion Safety Fund
items.description: This is the first time in two years that Binance has bought Bitcoin for its SAFU fund.

items.title: Why Is Nvidia Stock Down In Premarket?

items.title: Pharming Stock Draws Retail Buzz After FDA Seeks More Data For Pediatric Immune Drug — Why Investors Aren’t Panicking
items.description: The company expressed confidence that it can resolve the FDA’s inquiries.
